SummaryEnglish: Every three years, the young desert boy Luo Han ventures into the Central Plains, solely to deliver a medicinal cup to his friend Yi Lian. However, on this year's journey to deliver the cup, in order to resolve Yi Lian's troubles, Luo Han becomes embroiled in a significant case of embezzlement, drawing in various figures from the martial world and distinguished officials, stirring up the political landscape.
